name: D/D/D Flame Emperor Executive Genghis
desc:
1 Level 5 or higher "D/D" monster + 1 "D/D" monster
If another "D/D" monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned to your field, while you control this face-up card (except during the Damage Step): You can target 1 "D/D" monster in your GY; Special Summon it. You can only use this effect of "D/D/D Flame Emperor Executive Genghis" once per turn. Once per turn, during your turn, when a Spell/Trap or effect is activated (Quick Effect): You can negate the activation.
